dups()

Helps you find duplicates used in schema_to_yaml.rb for cleanup

[ show source ]

    # File lib/restfulx/configuration.rb, line 9
 9:   def dups
10:     inject({}) { |h,v| h[v] = h[v].to_i + 1; h }.reject{ |k,v| v == 1 }.keys
11:   end
